housing

  • Classes in housing used by housing 
    Class and Description
    Bank
    This class represents a mortgage-lender (i.e.
    Bank.Config
    This object holds the configutation for the Bank.
    Bank.Diagnostics
    This object interfaces to the MASON visualisation
    Government
    This class represents the government.
    Government.Config
    Configuration for the govenment.
    House
    Class representing a house.
    HouseBuyerRecord
    This class represents information regarding a household that has entered the housing market.
    Household
    This represents a household who receives an income, consumes, saves and can buy/sell/let/invest-in houses.
    Household.Config
    Configuration for a household.
    Household.Config.BuyToLetPurchaseDecision
    Investors decision as to whether to buy a house as a buy-to-let investment.
    Household.Config.ConsumptionEqn
    How much a household consumes
    Household.Config.PurchaseEqn
    Decide on desired purchase price as a function of monthly income and current appreciation of the house price index.
    Household.Config.RenterPurchaseDecision 
    Household.Config.SaleEqn
    The desired sale price of a house
    HouseRentalMarket
    Class that represents the market for houses for rent.
    HouseSaleMarket
    Class that represents market for houses for-sale.
    HouseSaleRecord
    This is the record containing information on a house that is for-sale.
    HousingMarket
    Implementation of the mechanism of the house-sale and house-rental markets.
    HousingMarket.Diagnostics
    Visualisation of the housing market
    IHouseOwner
    Interface for agents entering a housing market.
    MortgageApproval
    This class is created by a mortgage-lender when it approves a mortgage.
    TimeSeriesPlot
    This is a convenient wrapper for plotting time series
